title: DR!NK Juice Bar
description:
A 99% vegan juice bar with the exception of honey and bee pollen. Is 100% gluten free, organic and raw. Offering juices, smoothies, tonics, lassis, smoothie bowls, healing elixirs and fresh brewed tea. Unique use of fresh herbs and spices. Eco-friendly equipment and processes. 
Delivery available. Take-out only. Opened late May 2015. Close to the beach.
